content:
In Beryslav of the Kherson region, two people were injured after dumping an explosive object from the drone of the invaders.

About thisShe reported March 23Kherson Regional Military Administration.

“Russian troops continue to attack Berislav from drones. A 31-year-old man was injured in the dumping of the explosive object. He has a mine-explosive injury and a fragile wound of his feet. Another local 31-year-old resident received a concussion, multiple wounds of the head, face and feet, ”the message reads.

Both victims are provided with the necessary medical care.

As the Armyinform writes, today Russian troopsThey hit several dronesAccording to the "point of indomitable" in the Kherson region, three people were injured.
title: In Berislav, two people were injured as a result of a hostile drone attack
description: This was reported on March 23 by the Kherson Regional Military Administration. “Russian ...
author: Army Inform
